data.comment: The match is underway at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Alex Berenguer.
In the minute 2, Alex Berenguer returns to the field for Torino after picking up a slight injury.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 4, Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Torino.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 7, Simone Zaza (Torino) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Massimiliano Irrati awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Andrea Belotti scores to make it 1-0 at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Great play from Tomas Rincon to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 12, Atalanta's Marten De Roon gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Torino defender.
Papu Gomez gets an equalizer for Atalanta. The score is now 1-1.
Duvan Zapata instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 14, Torino drive upfield and Simone Zaza gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atalanta defender.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Atalanta's Robin Gosens has run offside.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Duvan Zapata's header is off-target for Atalanta.
Massimiliano Irrati awards Torino a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Atalanta's Robin Gosens gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 19, Massimiliano Irrati blows against Torino's Andrea Belotti for offside.
In Turin Torino's Alex Berenguer is caught offside.
Goal! Atalanta have got their heads in front thanks to a Luis Muriel strike.
In the minute 21, That's a fine assist from Papu Gomez.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
In the minute 25, Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Attention is being given to Torino’s Andrea Belotti and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 27, Andrea Belotti has recovered and rejoins the match in Turin.
Atalanta have a goal kick.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Torino.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Mattia Caldara (Atalanta) has received a yellow card from Massimiliano Irrati.
Throw-in Atalanta.
In the minute 31, Massimiliano Irrati awards the away team a throw-in.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
Luis Muriel (Atalanta) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 34, Atalanta's Duvan Zapata is whistled for offside at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick Torino.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Torino's Simone Zaza has been booked in Turin.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 41, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Torino.
Atalanta take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Hans Hateboer.
In the minute 42, Papu Gomez with an assist there.
Goal! A headed strike from the home team reduces their deficit to 2-3. Andrea Belotti got above everyone else to nod it in.
Alex Berenguer with an assist there.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Atalanta are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, Luis Muriel (Atalanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Atalanta needs to be cautious. Torino have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 46, Gian Piero Gasperini (Atalanta) is making a first substitution, with Jose Luis Palomino replacing Mattia Caldara.
Atalanta's Luis Muriel breaks free at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 48, Massimiliano Irrati awards Torino a goal kick.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Atalanta!
In the minute 51, In Turin Atalanta attack through Papu Gomez. The finish is off target, however.
Torino have a goal kick.
Massimiliano Irrati awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Torino's Alex Berenguer is on target but unsuccessful.
Hans Hateboer (Atalanta) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 54, Goal! Atalanta extend their lead to 2-4 through Marten De Roon.
Great play from Luis Muriel to set up the goal.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Turin.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Atalanta close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, Atalanta push forward at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino and Papu Gomez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Torino defence.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Andrea Belotti for Torino who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Andrea Belotti is back on his feet again.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 64, The home team replace Karol Linetty with Sasa Lukic.
The away team have replaced Luis Muriel with Ruslan Malinovskyi. This is the second substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
In the minute 65, Atalanta push forward at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino and Ruslan Malinovskyi gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Torino defence.
Marco Giampaolo is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino with Simone Verdi replacing Alex Berenguer.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 67, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Atalanta capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
In the minute 70, Massimiliano Irrati signals a Torino throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Throw-in Atalanta.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 71, Play has been interrupted briefly in Turin to check on Marten De Roon, who is grimacing with pain.
Atalanta's Marten De Roon looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Robin Gosens (Atalanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 74, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 75, Atalanta to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Vincenzo Millico is replacing Simone Zaza for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a Atalanta throw-in in Torino's half.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 78, Massimiliano Irrati signals a throw-in for Torino, close to Atalanta's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
The match at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino has been interrupted briefly for a check on Tomas Rincon, who is down injured.
In the minute 80, Jacopo Segre (Torino) has replaced the possibly injured Tomas Rincon.
Hans Hateboer for Atalanta is whistled offside.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Mario Pasalic is replacing Papu Gomez for Atalanta at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Goal kick for Atalanta at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Gian Piero Gasperini is making the team's fifth substitution at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino with Sam Lammers replacing Duvan Zapata.
In the minute 85, Johan Mojica is replacing Robin Gosens for the away team.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 87, Free kick Atalanta.
At Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino, Remo Freuler has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Massimiliano Irrati awards Torino a goal kick.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Atalanta.
Throw-in Torino.
Torino’s Andrea Belotti is on his feet again at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
In Turin, Andrea Belotti of Torino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Atalanta.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Bremer (Torino) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-4.
Massimiliano Irrati waits before resuming play because Andrea Belotti for Torino is still down.
